mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.user_id, p.region, p.start_date, p.end_date, pd.id as pd_id, pd.plan_id, pd.attraction_id, pd.day, pd.order from plan p left join plan_detail pd on p.id = pd.plan_id where p.user_id = #{userId} limit #{size} offset #{offset}

select p.id, p.title, p.user_id, p.region, p.start_date, p.end_date, pd.id as pd_id, pd.plan_id, pd.attraction_id, pd.day, pd.order from plan p left join plan_detail pd on p.id = pd.plan_id where p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into plan (title, user_id, region, start_date, end_date) values (#{title}, #{userId}, #{region}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
